sub_title: Treasury Officer at Hana Bank Amsterdam | MSc in Maritime Economics & Logistics | Erasmus University Rotterdam
summary:
Treasury Officer: Treasury FO, ALM, FX / MM Trader at KEB Hana Bank

MSc in Maritime Economics & Logistics at RSM, Erasmus University Rotterdam.
B.A. in Int'l Business & Economics (Magna Cum Laude), One Year of Full-Time Internship.

- Intern at Planning & Coordination Department of Ulsan Port Authority
- Data Assistant at S-Oil (Outsourced Job from Mirae-Tech)
- Worked 2 years in AIESEC (Non-Profit Student Organization) including 1 year of Local Committee President : Board and Member Management, Financial Planning, HR
